rows.label: qst201808_msg0001
rows.name:
Hi there!
Mind if I bend your ear a minute?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0002
rows.name:
Are they Cobalt Eels?!
Can I have some?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0003
rows.name:
Hold your horses, buddy,
I wanna talk first!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0004
rows.name:
Come on, I'll tell you anything,
just gimme! Gimme!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, cut the dramatics.
There's plenty to go around.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0006
rows.name:
Here, and make sure to share them
with everyone!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0007
rows.name:
Yum! Nosh!
So darn tasty!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0008
rows.name: Um, right, so...

rows.label: qst201808_msg0009
rows.name: Ah, yes! You wanted to talk?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0010
rows.name:
A Phonex called Pepe was supposed
to come here, to Invidia...

rows.label: qst201808_msg0011
rows.name:
Would you mind telling us if
you know anything?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0012
rows.name: Ah, the guy from Liberalitas?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0013
rows.name: So you do know something!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0014
rows.name:
Sure thing! Crossing the Cloud Sea
with no regard for the risks involved
takes a special kind of courage.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0015
rows.name:
Kids like him surely deserve
to be called heroes!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0016
rows.name: Do you know where Pepe is now?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0017
rows.name:
Ah, see, I'd thought he was just talking
to his friends, but then he goes and
declares he's going to Temperantia.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0018
rows.name:
Kept talking about looking for
hardened companions for a bit,
then off he went, some kids in tow.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0020
rows.name: Temperantia?!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0021
rows.name:
If I recall, weren't there Superbian
troops stationed in Temperantia?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0022
rows.name: Yes, that is correct...

rows.label: qst201808_msg0023
rows.name:
That's bad!
That's really very bad!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0024
rows.name:
If Superbians catch them, they might
eat them, or worse yet, skin them!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0025
rows.name: We must hurry to their rescue!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0026
rows.name: ...Uka, you're exaggerating again.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0027
rows.name:
Please, relax. The Superbian Armed
Forces pose no threat to Phonexes.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0028
rows.name: You can't know that!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0029
rows.name:
This is Superbians we're talking about!
God only knows what they'll do!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0030
rows.name: We have to go, now! Let's move!
